subject: Leadership
title: Team Purpose and Mission
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Team Purpose and Mission.

hook.text: A hospital cleaning crew outperforms others on every metric. They see themselves as part of patient healing.

buildup.text: Purpose answers 'why we exist.' Mission answers 'what we do.' Together they give a team identity beyond tasks.

discovery.text: Teams with clear purpose show 30% higher engagement. Purpose turns routine tasks into meaningful contributions.

twist.text: Leaders often assume the team knows its purpose. Most members can't articulate why their work matters.

climax.text: The best leaders co-create purpose with the team. When people help define the mission, they own it deeply.

quiz.question: Why is co-creating purpose with the team effective?
options: It avoids the need for goals
